Comment: Everyone on here love to say "The Dems, The Dems, The Dems", every time Trump does something, but realistically, Republicans need to stop blindly voting along party lines. If something is idiotic, and their constituents clearly don't want it, don't vote for it just because Trump said so.  They are so afraid that their peers in congress wont think their cool anymore, while people in their actual district hate them and they have to walk down the street with security.
